queriesFeature.query: project ='ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status !=Отменен ORDER BY priority

project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит уточнения')  AND issuetype in (Question) ORDER BY priority

queriesVersion.query: project in (HCS, HCSPAFO) AND type = Task AND status not in (Отменен, Отменена) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND fixVersion != 'Вне версии' AND component not in (Tech_Task, Test_Task, Bug_Task) ORDER BY status ASC
